articles.title: Record-breaking flare erupts from neighboring star - CNN
articles.description: A giant flare has erupted from nearby star Proxima Centauri that is 100 times more powerful than any flare our sun has ever released. The flare ranks as one of the most violent seen anywhere in the Milky Way galaxy.
